title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working.
body: After I updated my computer OS to Windows 10,  it keeps popping up as "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working " and I would be forced to close the program. Anyone have a afix for this?

replies.body:
Hi there. If you guys are looking for a real solution please check this one:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/fTGsdZLk-solution-for-patcher-kernel

Bump. I have had this problem since Windows 8.1. I sent support tickets to Riot but they just replied with tips like "open with admin" and other stuff that I would have obviously tried before asking them as a final resort. They haven't really bothered to fix this problem for a while and its probably going to take a long time until they actually start looking into it. I haven't been able to play for 1.5 months and I have spent a lot of money on a game that won't even open. Just switch to another game at this point.
